mapper.select: select boa_id , boa_content , boa_create_date , boa_modify_date , boa_latitude , boa_longitude , boa_photo_savefile , boa_photo_originalfile , boa_video_originalfile , boa_video_savefile , mem_id from CS_BOARD where mem_id = #{mem_id} and boa_video_originalfile is null and boa_photo_originalfile is not null order by boa_id
